meanings.sent1: The accordances between the two friends made their conversations enjoyable.

meanings.definition: The act of granting or bestowing
meanings.sent1: The accordances of gifts during the holiday season brought joy to all.
meanings.sent2: The king's accordances of titles to his loyal subjects were greatly appreciated.
meanings.sent3: The accordances of awards at the ceremony made everyone feel special.
meanings.sent4: Her accordances of kindness towards others were always genuine.
meanings.sent5: The accordances of blessings from the elders were believed to bring good fortune.

meanings.definition: A relationship or similarity between things
meanings.sent1: The accordances between the two paintings were strikingly evident.
meanings.sent2: There were many accordances between the two historical events.
meanings.sent3: The accordances between the flavors in the dish created a unique taste.
